song.title: Out of Order
song.info:
The original idea/outline of the work and the instruments were made by SuperNoise. Then I joined in :) I compressed Supernoise's 5 minutes into 2 minutes, re-arranged everything, reworked drums, piano.
Then I added a dubstep interlude ;D
The worst thing was to come up with the outro - I lacked ideas. That's why it is IMO the weakest part of the song.
- AceMan
All samples based on sound synthesis. VST instrument used for sound generation: Zebra2, Z3ta+, ARP2600, uTonic, Analog Warfare 2.5, Arch Avenger Pro, Massive, TyrellN6, FM8, V-Station, Moog Modular. DSP Chain: Renoise DSP plugins, Classic Auto-Filter, Classic Delay, TLs2095-LA,MEqualizer, TLs-3127, TAL Reverb 2, D-16 Redoptor, Reacomp.
This tune got #2 place in streaming music competition @ WeCan 2013.
